title: I recently learned the size of Heimer's wrenches scale with his AD
body:
I was playing Heimer one-for-all and was the guy who chose to go AD.
Mid-game I noticed that the wrenches I was chucking were a bit bigger than usual.
Late game I was hurling wrenches the size of my head at people.
It brought a tear to my eye, it was so beautiful.

replies.body: So Janna can make Heimer's wrench bigger?
Janna makes everyone's wrench bigger

That....

That should have been expected ._.
Well I bet you didn't expect that for only $2.95 a minute, she will leave you breathless.

> [{quoted}](name=phoinix,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FAqVsYv7,comment-id=000c000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-30T04:54:03.049+0000)
>
> Well I bet you didn't expect that for only $2.95 a minute, she will leave you breathless.

and leave you with larger wretchs
Warning: if your wrench does not return to normal size after 4 hours seek immediate medical attention.
And first stop looking up Janna on certain websites... if you know what I mean.
I didn't, I thought it was just going to be a harmless breeze...
Raise your dongers! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
it makes mine smaller because of the cold breeze
Nope.
Now hoping for new vandrill youtube video, maximum wrench size possible
Soraka needs a bigger banana.

The size of her AA actually increases with distance, in case you didn't know. Vandrill has a youtube video about the largest size Soraka AA animation. It goes about half a lane then disappears but will still do damage.
We can make it bigger, stronger, faster...
I wonder... do all ranges AA's scale with AD? If so that'd be hilarious

> I wonder... do all ranges AA's scale with AD? If so that'd be hilarious

Um so Jhin get's like 800 AD, wouldn't his bullets just be like firing towers down the lanes size wise?

Revel in my 4 am photo editing skills

Well their size increase depending on how far they travel '__'

Well I don't know what Sorakas YOU play with, but I've never seen one build AD..
Huh, interesting.

This post immediately made me think of this gif

https://media.giphy.com/media/BUH1tiEFQzKtW/giphy.gif

I understand you want to play AD heimer support, but your team mates ~~do not~~ **want you** to play AD heimer support.

...I mean imagine all the vayne mains you can make rage over the donger poke ~~damage~~ size. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Well now I can't ever play ap anymore
